attributes.action: bring back hanging for cases as in  the baby p murder
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: make the punishment fit the crime.We will  not tolerate these people whiling  away their time in prison at the taxpayers expense. They should pay for their crime with their lives.

rejection.details:
There are several petitions already in existence:
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/childrensjustice/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
